articles.title: High-Gain Antenna for NASA's Roman Mission Clears Environmental Tests - NASA
articles.description: Engineers at NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center in Greenbelt, Maryland, have finished testing the high-gain antenna for the Nancy Grace Roman Space Telescope. This antenna will provide the primary communication link between the Roman spacecraft and the ground.
